    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"

>
[Rampaging Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4529) <actions string="Free Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Orc" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=124" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=4514)

**Trigger**
You use Orc Ferocity

</column>

---

You lash out viciously even as you fend off death. Make a single melee [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89). If this Strike brings a foe to 0 Hit Points, this activation of [Orc Ferocity](/Feats.aspx?ID=83) doesn’t count against its frequency
name: Rampaging Ferocity
